title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.19 - Employees may prefer charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 52.19 - Employees may prefer charges

State Regulations

Charges may be preferred by any employee of the department. Such charges must be made in writing, signed by the person preferring them and
sent to the warden of the institution in which the accused is employed. In case
a person not in the employ of the department shall make a complaint or bring
charges against an employee, such charges must also be made to the warden and
signed by the complainant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
52.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
